catalog.name: Power density
catalog.description:
This collection contains wind power density maps expressed in W/m2 calculated as an annual average over 30 years of data at different heights.
In particular, these calculations derive from the new Italian anemological database consisting of 30 years of data at an hourly and spatial time step of 1.4 km, using the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) meteorological model combined with post-processing statistical based on Analog Ensemble (AnEn).

members.name: Onshore wind power density
members.description: This collection includes maps of onshore wind power density (W/m<sup>2</sup>) at heights of 50, 75, 100, 125 and 150 m s.l.t.
